snippet.title: Quasar Commander for the TRS-80 CoCo
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

This is a ROM cartridge game which puts you in command of a starship, looking into outerspace through the forward "viewscreen." With each hand on a joystick, you dodge and blast enemy Scouts and Battle Cruisers bent on your destruction. You can switch your view to radar, detecting ships too far away to see in your viewscreen, and both the viewscreen and radar can be zoomed in and out. Your ship's shield protects you from collisions and enemy fire; when it's gone, so are you.
